channel.title: How to I get update timer and make NPCs without trade option trade?
channel.description: How do I get a countdown timer till I have an update? Because I want one. (Tell me where to code it in and what to code) Also how do I make NPCs that only have a talkto option trade? I made 6 shops, and I had to search for NPCs with a trade option...
